mapper.select:
select
from saas_pos_team where (enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} or enterprise_id = '0') order by id desc

select
from saas_pos_team where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and team_type = 1 order by id desc
select count(1) from saas_pos_team where code = #{code} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select count(1) from saas_pos_team where name = #{name} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select count(1) from saas_pos_team where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and (name = #{name} or id=#{id})
select id, name from saas_pos_team where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and status=1
select id, name from saas_pos_team where (parent_id = #{enterpriseId} or enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}) and status=1
